name: Mechanical Design Engineer
description:
Уважаемые соискатели,

Мы очень просим вас сразу присылать резюме на английском языке.

Спасибо!

Responsibilities:

  • Activities during the bidding phase: codes and standards; M.R. issue for offer request with the scope of cost estimation, offer tabulation and technical evaluation;

  • Basic engineering activity: mechanical data sheets preparation, preparation of the material requisitions;

  • Detailed engineering and purchase assistance activities: initial general activities, preparation of general specifications and forms, preparation of data sheets of request for quotation (RFQ);

  • Preparation of "material requisition (M.R.)" for bid inquiry, technical tabulation of offers and issue of technical bid evaluation, issue of M.R. for purchase order, verification of vendor's drawings and documents;

  • Preparation of mechanical manuals, assistance during plant erection, participation at "kick-off" meetings, "design conferences" etc. with the client, document filing;

  • Monitor the technical quality of engineering and design documents by doing spot-checks and participating in reviews, equipment and materials requisition technical parts of contracts, etc.;

  • Prepare Mechanical Data Sheets including equipment sizing, identification of equipment specifications and equipment interface including compressors, pumps, turbines, controls, power supply, utility requirements, environmental regulation requirements and other equipment assessments;

  • Participate in the development of the project integrated schedule and assessment of physical progress;

  • Develop and adopting the most cost-effective, fit-for purpose total project solution for the project;

  • Implement Change management procedure. Reviews and approval of technical changes and related cost and schedule impacts;

  • Ensure coordination with other disciplines, with Procurement and Construction, and between Contractors for discipline issues;

  • Ensure proper reporting, highlighting critical issues to the Engineering Manager and proposing remedial actions.

Requirements:

  • Higher technical education in Mechanical Engineering discipline

  • Experience in Mechanical design and engineering at least 5 years

  • Competent static equipment design experience (Pressure vessels; Storage tanks; Shell & tube heat exchangers; Plate Heat exchangers; Air coolers; Fired Heaters; Flares)

  • Experience in work within EPC companies / in petrochemical industry is preferable

  • Understanding of international / Russian codes and standards such as ANSI, ASME, BS, ASTM, API, GOST, SNIP etc. related to the discipline required

  • Rotating equipment experience would be a "nice to have", but secondary to static equipment experience

  • Knowledge of quality and safety procedures

  • English - fluent

  • Readiness for business trips

Conditions:
  • Work location - Moscow
  • Benefits package includes medical insurance and meal allowance
